text: Wide Awake is the debut studio album by the American post-hardcore band Picture Me Broken following the success of their Dearest, I'm So Sorry EP. The album features seven new tracks and five singles: "Dearest, I'm So Sorry", "Echoes of an Empire", "If I Never Wake Again", "Skin & Bones", and "Nerds & Cigarettes".Wide Awake: Picture Me Broken Allmusic ==Track listing== ==Personnel== *Layla Brooklyn Allman – vocals, keyboards *Will Escher – guitars, backing vocals *Austin Dunn – bass, backing vocals *Connor Lung – drums, backing vocals ==Production== *Arranged by Picture Me Broken *Produced, recorded and mixed by Scott Gillman, Aaron Hellam, Scott Llamas and Mudrock *Mastered by Ari Blitz and Shelly Yakus ==References== Category:2010 debut albums Category:Picture Me Broken albums Category:Megaforce Records albums
